name: 90octane
description:
90octane is a digital agency that specializes in Top Pursuit Marketing(TM). We help clients connect with and convert their most valued prospects. 
That means we like the hard stuff. The almost impossible stuff.
 
It means hyper-targeting your story to a town in Italy to influence a key decision maker. It means becoming a thought leader in a market where your brand is unknown. It means creating customer-ambassadors who know more about your product than your sales team.
